mapper.select: SELECT a.teachingId, a.parentId, p.parentName, p.telNum as telephone, a.memberId as studentId, s.`name` as studentName, o.lessonType FROM order_teaching_r a LEFT JOIN parents p ON a.parentId=p.parentId LEFT JOIN student s ON a.memberId=s.memberId LEFT JOIN ordersum o ON a.orderId = o.orderId WHERE o.teachingWay = 3 AND a.teacherId = #{teacherId}
